comments: Contains all integers infinitely often. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 06 2012
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (PARI) v=[]; for(n=1,260,v=concat(v,floor(cotan(n)))); v(MAGMA) [Floor(Cot(n)): n in [1..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 15 2015
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 30 2001
extensions: a(44) corrected by _T. D. Noe_, Jan 21 2008
